Question: In the 1990s and 2000s this person has continued to contribute to a wide range of musical projects as a guest artist.
Hints: This person reprised his role in Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides, released in May 2011.
"Jake" Clare, this person sang in a trio of boy sopranos at, among other occasions, Westminster Abbey for Queen Elizabeth II.
This person attended Wentworth Primary School with Mick Jagger and was his neighbour until 1954, when the family moved.
